'''17w18a''' is the tenth [[snapshot]] for [[Java Edition 1.12]], released on May 3, 2017.<ref>{{snap|17w18a|May 3, 2017}}</ref> It was later reuploaded to fix an aspect ratio issue.<ref>{{tweet|Dinnerbone|859772714571247616|The aspect ratio is really wrong - I'm gonna fix it as soon as I get some time. Sorry! :(}}</ref>

== Additions ==
=== Gameplay ===
'''Gamerules'''
* {{cmd|gamerule announceAdvancements}}
** Defaults to true.
** Toggles announcing of advancements in chat, replacing the old <code>server.properties</code> entry.

=== Command format ===
{{cmd|reload}}
* Command to reload advancements and loot tables from disk.
* This command is available to all [[op]]ped players in single player and to all level 4 operators on a multiplayer server.
* Cannot be run from a [[command block]].

=== General ===
'''[[Advancement]]s'''
* Re-introduced announcements to chat when someone earns an advancement.
** Shows the description on hover, like before with [[achievement]]s.
* Added three advancements to the "Adventure" tab:

{{AdvancementTable|Adventure}}
{{AdvancementRow
|title=Best Friends Forever
|bg=plain
|Lead
|Tame an animal
|Sweet dreams
|Tame one of these 7 tameable mobs: [[ocelot]], [[donkey]], [[horse]], [[mule]], [[wolf]], [[parrot]], [[llama]].
|adventure/tame_an_animal
}}
{{AdvancementRow
|title=The Parrots and the Bats
|bg=plain
|Wheat
|Breed two animals together
|Sweet dreams
|Breed a pair of any of these 10 mobs: [[sheep]], [[cow]]s, [[pig]]s, [[rabbit]]s, [[chicken]]s, [[horse]]s, [[wolves]], [[ocelot]]s, [[mooshroom]]s, and [[llama]]s.
|adventure/breed_an_animal
}}
{{AdvancementRow
|title=Two by Two
|bg=fancy
|Golden Carrot
|Breed all the animals!
|The Parrots and the Bats
|Breed a pair of each of the mobs mentioned above.
|adventure/bred_all_animals
}}
{{AdvancementTable|foot}}

* Added new <code>minecraft:tick</code> trigger.
** Activates for each player on every tick, provided that the advancement was revoked before the next tick starts.
* Added new <code>minecraft:tame_animal</code> trigger.
** Activates whenever the player tames an animal. The <code>entity</code> condition can be specified to check that the animal that was tamed.
* Added new <code>show_toast</code> display option.
** Optional boolean defaulting to true. When false, the specified advancement does not display the toast popup when the advancement is fulfilled.
* Added new <code>announce_to_chat</code> display option.
** Optional boolean defaulting to true. When false, this specific advancement does not announce the player fulfilling it to the chat for all players to see.

== Changes ==
=== Blocks ===
'''[[Command block]]s'''
* Optimized error conditions.

=== Items ===
'''[[Map]]s'''
* Changed some map colors around, again.
** Reverted the wool colors on maps.
** Moved dyed blocks such as banners to the new terracotta map color palette.

=== Command format ===
{{cmd|give}} and {{cmd|replaceitem}}
* Now reinforce item-specific stacking restrictions.<ref name=":0">{{bug|MC-117005}} resolved as "Works as Intended"</ref>
** This is a reverse of 16w32a. ({{bug|MC-105965}} resolved as "Works as Intended")

=== General ===
'''[[Advancement]]s'''
* "entity" objects and the <code>minecraft:levitation</code> trigger now use a shared "distance" object.
** Check if the player is within or outside of the specified range on the <code>x</code>, <code>y</code>, or <code>z</code> axis (in either the positive or negative direction).
** <code>absolute</code> and <code>horizontal</code> ranges check if the player is within range on all axes, though <code>horizontal</code> excludes the Y axis.
* Changed the "Great View From Up Here" advancement to 50 vertical blocks.
* Changed the "Sniper Duel" advancement to horizontal distance.
* Advancement loading is now strict [[JSON]].

'''[[Narrator]]'''
* Optimized, it should work for more people now.

'''[[Recipe book]]s'''
* Some optimizations.
* If the [[player]] searches "'''excitedze'''" in the recipe book, their language switches to Pirate Speak.
** Searching "'''excited'''" no longer does this.
